rule.breakableObsdian.name: breakableObsdian
rule.breakableObsdian.desc: Change the hardness of obsdian to deepslate (hardness:3)
rule.tntDestroysEverything.name: tntDestroysEverything
rule.tntDestroysEverything.desc: TNT can destroy any block not protected by fluid (BlastResistance:0)
rule.noteBlockChunkLoader.name: noteBlockChunkLoader
rule.noteBlockChunkLoader.desc: Load nearby 3x3 chunks for 15 seconds when a note block is triggered
rule.bellChunkLoader.name: bellChunkLoader
rule.bellBlockChunkLoader.desc: Load nearby 3x3 chunks for 15 seconds when a bell is triggered
rule.pistonBlockChunkLoader.name: pistonBlockChunkLoader
rule.pistonBlockChunkLoader.desc: Load nearby 3x3 chunks for 15 seconds when a piston with a bone block at its top extends
